lore: No greater or more inspirational figurehead is there to the T’au than Aun’Va, the Ethereal Supreme. Under his stony regard the Hunter Cadres strive to achieve excellence beyond imagining, fighting as though some living embodiment of the T’au’Va itself moved amongst them and demanded all that they could give.
keywords: keywords – all models: infantry aun’va: aun’va

otherAbilities.name: Duality Shield
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

otherAbilities.name: Paradox of Duality
otherAbilities.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

otherAbilities.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
otherAbilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6'' of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.
